name: Squarewave Maker
description:
Squarewave Maker’s gameplay motto is “Perform, Create and Share.”

Perform first of all because one of the Squarewave Maker's game design goals is to make the player feel like they are a musical performer.
To achieve this, Squarewave Maker is not relying on recorded audio track but on synthesizers instead, so the music can be performed live by you throughout your gameplay.
Squarewave Maker is transmuting your gaming skills into badass electronic music.

Creation is at the heart of Squarewave Maker. We're providing you with a wide variety of music and level design tools, but no prior musical or level design knowledge is needed. Indeed, thanks to the jumpography game mode you will build awesome levels and music through a series of creative missions of increasing difficulty.

Last but not least, the sharing possibilities are the backbone of Squarewave Maker's community, letting other players get access to the levels, songs, and synthesizer presets you’ve created.
Each of these elements will be scored and ranked on creative leaderboards, ensuring creative players are rewarded and valued as much as performing players.

Squarewave Maker is the place where gamers and musicians meet and have fun together.Features
  • Low latency and audio accurate game systems that make playing a level like being part of a musical performance.
  • Tons of included levels waiting to be mastered.
  • Challenging scoring and ranking system based on player's velocity and precision.
  • Single and multiplayer game modes.
  • Creative missions available through the "jumpography" game mode.
  • Game editors to create your own levels.
  • Various building block themes and playable characters to choose from to fit with your level design ideas.
